description: This light salad delivers the sweetness of grilled pears fused with the saltiness of the prosciutto and creaminess of goats cheese. A perfect flavour combination.
name: Grilled Pears with Rocket, Prosciutto & Soft Goats Cheese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 medium pears, peeled, cored and quartered
16 slices proscuitto, cooked and store bought
1 small red onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish the pears in the canola oil. Chargrill the pears on a medium heat for about 5 minutes while turning.
Combine the rocket, olive oil, goats cheese and red onion in a bowl. Serve the grilled pears with the salad, breadsticks and tomatoes.
